column1: The Pit Room////Decided to stop in after visiting the museum district for some BBQ. I have to say it wasn't my favorite
column2: they've been open for 2 months now and still fairly new and might just need to work through the trials. Several items were out
column3: so I decided on the Brisket
column4: Mac N Cheese and Charro beans. The brisket dries out once it starts cooling
column5: the Mac N cheese was great but the charro beans had tons of spice nut no flavor. The guest I took with me also had Brisket
column6: Cole slaw and potatoes salad and they truly didn't care for anything. I wouldn't say its awful
column7: its just not worth it either. The staff was super friendly and the atmosphere was great
column8: but I wouldn't go back for the food. Maybe it'll get better with time?
